about.title: About J&J Law Firm
about.paragraph1: J&J Law Firm stands as a premier provider of sophisticated legal services in the Democratic Republic of Congo. Under the leadership of Attorney Jethro Muyombi Tshimbu, Managing Partner specializing in economic and mining law, and Attorney John Ngoy Kibambe Kabange, Partner, the firm combines rigorous technical expertise with advanced legal strategy. Our founding partners, trained at prestigious institutions and experienced in both public and private sectors, advise multinational corporations, government entities, and institutional clients on complex transactions and high-stakes litigation.
about.paragraph2: Our international reach is further strengthened by Attorney Mizou NSANDA BILONGO, admitted to the Paris Bar and the Kinshasa-Matete Bar. With an LL.M. from the United States and trilingual professional proficiency, she brings specialized expertise in OHADA business law, transaction tax, and natural resources law. Her cross-border experience enhances our capacity to advise clients in investment, international trade, infrastructure, and natural resource sectors.
about.paragraph3: Our team of associate attorneys—Attorneys Olga Kasongo, Daniel Kyungu, Emmanuel Matongo, and Séraphin Kabamba—complements this executive expertise with deep competencies in private law, family law, labor law, and public law. This multidisciplinary synergy ensures comprehensive legal coverage for our clients.
about.paragraph4: What distinguishes J&J Law Firm is our integrated approach: combining local knowledge with global standards. Multilingual and deeply rooted in Congolese legal realities, our attorneys share core values of absolute transparency, strategic listening, and unwavering commitment to our clients' interests. The firm has established itself as a benchmark for sophisticated legal counsel in Central Africa and beyond.

legal_notice.title: Legal Notice
legal_notice.intro_1: J&J Law Firm (accessible at JJLawFirm) is committed to protecting the confidentiality of our visitors. This Privacy Policy outlines the types of information collected and recorded by J&J Law Firm and how we use such information.
legal_notice.intro_2: If you have additional questions or require further information about our Privacy Policy, please contact us.
legal_notice.intro_3: This Privacy Policy applies exclusively to our online activities and is valid for website visitors regarding information they share with J&J Law Firm. This policy does not apply to information collected offline or via channels other than this website.
legal_notice.consent_text: By using our website, you hereby consent to our Privacy Policy and agree to its terms.
legal_notice.information_collect_text_1: Personal information you are asked to provide, and the reasons for such requests, will be clearly communicated at the time of collection.
legal_notice.information_collect_text_2: If you contact us directly, we may receive additional information about you, including your name, email address, phone number, the contents of your message and attachments, and any other information you choose to provide.
legal_notice.information_collect_text_3: When you register for an account, we may request contact information including name, company name, address, email address, and telephone number.
legal_notice.how_use_information_intro: We use collected information for various purposes, including:
legal_notice.use_list_1: Provide, operate, and maintain our website
legal_notice.use_list_2: Improve, personalize, and expand our website
legal_notice.use_list_3: Understand and analyze website usage patterns
legal_notice.use_list_4: Develop new products, services, features, and functionalities
legal_notice.use_list_5: Communicate with you, directly or through partners, for customer service, updates, and marketing purposes
legal_notice.log_files_text: J&J Law Firm follows standard log file procedures. These files record visitors when they access websites. All hosting companies employ this practice as part of analytics services. Log file information includes internet protocol (IP) addresses, browser type, Internet Service Provider (ISP), date/time stamps, referring/exit pages, and click counts. This information is not linked to personally identifiable information and is used to analyze trends, administer the site, track user movement, and gather demographic information.
legal_notice.advertising_partners_text_1: You may consult this list to find the Privacy Policy for each advertising partner of J&J Law Firm.
legal_notice.advertising_partners_text_2: Third-party ad servers or networks use technologies such as cookies, JavaScript, or web beacons in their respective advertisements and links appearing on J&J Law Firm, which are sent directly to users' browsers. They automatically receive your IP address when this occurs. These technologies measure advertising campaign effectiveness and/or personalize advertising content on websites you visit.
legal_notice.advertising_partners_text_3: J&J Law Firm has no access to or control over cookies used by third-party advertisers.
legal_notice.third_party_policies_text_1: J&J Law Firm's Privacy Policy does not apply to other advertisers or websites. We advise you to consult the respective privacy policies of third-party ad servers for detailed information, including their practices and opt-out instructions.
legal_notice.third_party_policies_text_2: You may disable cookies through individual browser settings. Detailed cookie management information for specific browsers is available on their respective websites.
legal_notice.ccpa_rights: CCPA Privacy Rights (Do Not Sell My Personal Information)
legal_notice.ccpa_intro: Under the CCPA, DRC consumers have the right to:
legal_notice.ccpa_right_1: Request disclosure of categories and specific pieces of personal data collected by a business
legal_notice.ccpa_right_2: Request deletion of personal data collected by a business
legal_notice.ccpa_right_3: Request that a business not sell the consumer's personal data
legal_notice.ccpa_response: We will respond to such requests within one month. To exercise these rights, please contact us.
legal_notice.gdpr_intro: We are committed to ensuring you are fully informed of all data protection rights. Every user is entitled to:
legal_notice.gdpr_right_access: The right to access – You have the right to request copies of your personal data. A small fee may apply.
legal_notice.gdpr_right_rectification: The right to rectification – You have the right to request correction of inaccurate information or completion of incomplete information.
legal_notice.gdpr_right_erasure: The right to erasure – You have the right to request deletion of your personal data, under certain conditions.
legal_notice.gdpr_right_restrict: The right to restrict processing – You have the right to request restriction of processing your personal data, under certain conditions.
legal_notice.gdpr_right_object: The right to object to processing – You have the right to object to our processing of your personal data, under certain conditions.
legal_notice.gdpr_right_portability: The right to data portability – You have the right to request transfer of collected data to another organization or directly to you, under certain conditions.
legal_notice.gdpr_response: We will respond to such requests within one month. To exercise these rights, please contact us.

attorney_detail.name: Attorney Jethro Muyombi Tshimbu
attorney_detail.bio: Attorney Jethro Muyombi Tshimbu is the Managing Partner of J&J Law Firm. He is admitted to the Kinshasa/Matete Bar and practices extensively in economic law, mining law, OHADA business law, and corporate law. He has held senior legal positions in major mining companies and has over 15 years of experience advising on complex transactions, regulatory compliance, and high-stakes litigation.

She is trilingual in French, English, and Dutch.

attorney_detail_daniel.bio: Attorney Daniel Kyungu Danis is an Associate Attorney at J&J Law Firm, admitted to the Bar and practicing before the DRC courts. He specializes in constitutional law, civil law, international humanitarian law, and OHADA law. Attorney Kyungu holds a Bachelor of Laws from the University of Lubumbashi and is a PhD candidate in Law at the same institution. He serves as a Teaching Assistant at the Universities of Lubumbashi and Kamina and consults for Médecins Sans Frontières France (MSF). His practice combines rigorous legal analysis with academic research, providing strategic counsel in complex civil and humanitarian law matters. He is fluent in French, English, Swahili, Lingala, and Tshiluba.

practice_detail_ohada.title: OHADA Business Law
practice_detail_ohada.intro_1: The Democratic Republic of Congo acceded to the Treaty on the Harmonization of Business Law in Africa (OHADA) in 2010, with full effect from September 12, 2012. OHADA unites 17 West and Central African nations under a common, modern business law framework.
practice_detail_ohada.intro_2: J&J Law Firm maintains comprehensive expertise across all OHADA Uniform Acts (corporate law, commercial law, securities, collective proceedings, arbitration, accounting law, and contracts). We guide enterprises through the transition to and compliance with OHADA standards, ensuring legal security and competitiveness throughout the OHADA space.
practice_detail_ohada.expertise_text: We facilitate your integration into the OHADA legal framework, ensuring seamless transition and complete compliance with all applicable Uniform Acts.
practice_detail_ohada.approach_text: Our attorneys have received specialized training from leading OHADA law experts and regularly participate in continuing legal education seminars. All business law documents we prepare—articles of association, shareholder meeting minutes, registry filings—comply fully with OHADA requirements.

practice_detail_ohada.service_2: OHADA security interests (guarantees) and RCCM registration

practice_detail_constitutional.intro_3: Our firm advises citizens, companies, and institutions in understanding and applying administrative law, which governs and limits the scope of action of public officials. This expertise allows our clients to fully exercise their prerogatives while protecting themselves against sanctions that may arise from ignorance or misapplication of administrative rules.

practice_detail_intellectual.action_text: Our team of accredited intellectual property agents ensures the legal protection of your creations and inventions in the DRC and internationally.
practice_detail_intellectual.process_1_desc: Preliminary study of the contemplated protection, prior art search to verify availability, and advice on the optimal protection strategy.
practice_detail_intellectual.process_2_desc: Drafting of official forms, preparation of required documents, and filing of the application with the competent offices as an accredited agent.
practice_detail_intellectual.process_3_desc: Monitoring of application examination, response to objections, obtaining the title, and management of renewals and international extensions.
practice_detail_intellectual.sidebar_text: Do you have an invention to protect? A trademark to register? Our team of accredited intellectual property agents ensures the legal protection of your creations.
